overview: THE LAUNDROMAT OFF MALIBU is a live-action, psychological thriller short film. Set in a small, run-down laundromat located off Malibu’s Pacific Coast Highway, it tells the story of the mysterious Sarah, a staff worker, and her interactions with Jason Cormack, a customer who hides a dark secret. As we find out more about Jason’s past and his reasons for being there, we realize that the laundromat is not what it appears to be.
title: The Laundromat Off Malibu
